Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has been in the news this week as he unveils a $2.2 billion health package to improve healthcare for Australians. The package includes boosting the nursing workforce and providing better access to after-hours clinics among other reforms. Moreover he announced a $2 billion increase in the healthcare budget to provide support for people living in remote and regional areas. Additionally next month's federal budget will face scrutiny for increased government spending. The PIRF review is expected to have an impact on post-coronavirus economic recovery plans. Finally the Australian tourism industry is experiencing a revival particularly in the Northern Territory where bookings for March 2022 have surged by 66.5% compared to the same period in the previous year.
